meanings.definition: The act of adding color to something.
meanings.sent1: Her tintings of the flowers made them look more beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The artist's tintings of the sky captured the essence of a sunset.
meanings.sent3: The tintings of the walls turned out to be a mix of unexpected colors.
meanings.sent4: His tintings of the canvas were like a rainbow melting into a puddle.
meanings.sent5: The tintings of the landscape were so vivid, they seemed to come alive.

meanings.definition: The result of adding color to something.
meanings.sent1: The tintings on the fabric were vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The tintings on the old photograph had faded over time.
meanings.sent3: The tintings on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The tintings on the horizon signaled the arrival of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The tintings on the leaves created a beautiful mosaic of colors.
